name: measure_distance_reverse
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cameroon.
Tool description: The Cameroon API provides endpoints to lookup locations, find facilities and perform geospatial operations such as distance calculation and directions between two locations in Cameroon.
API description: Calculates the distance between two addresses in Cameroon using the specified unit of measurement.

stop_address.description: The destination address for which the distance needs to be calculated.

start_address.description: The starting address for which the distance needs to be calculated.

unit.description: Unit of distance measurement, valid options are **km** (default), **mi**, **ft**, and **yd**.
